contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox French commune |name = Quincampoix |region = [[Haute-Normandie]] |department = [[Seine-Maritime]] [[Image:Blason76.svg|20px]] |arrondissement = Rouen |canton = Clères |INSEE = 76517 |postal code = 76230 |mayor = Didier Dubaillay |term = |intercommunality = |longitude = 1.1853 |latitude = 49.5253 |elevation m = 166 |elevation min m = 80 |elevation max m = 180 |area km2 = 20.34 |population = 3163 |population date = 2006 }} '''Quincampoix''' is a [[Communes of France|commune]] in the [[Seine-Maritime]] [[Departments of France|department]] in the [[Haute-Normandie]] region in northern [[France]]. ==Geography== A [[farming]] village situated some {{convert|6|mi|km}} northeast of [[Rouen]] at the junction of the D90, D928 and the D51 roads. ==Heraldry== {{Blazon-arms | img1=Blason Quincampoix.svg | legend1=Arms of Quincampoix | text=The arms of Quincampoix are [[blazon]]ed :<br />''Per fess 1: Or, a chestnut tree vert issuant from the line of division and 2: Azure, a chevron between a mullet and a toothed wheel and, in saltire, a pitchfork and an ax Or.'' (created 1977) }} ==Population== {| align="center" rules="all" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="4" style="border: 1px solid #999; border-right: 2px solid #999; border-bottom:2px solid #999; background: #f3fff3" |+ style="font-weight: bold; font-size: 1.1em; margin-bottom: 0.5em"|Population history |-style="background: #ddffdd" ! 1962 !! 1968 !! 1975 !! 1982 !! 1990 !! 1999 !! 2006 |- | align=center| 969 || align=center| 1022 || align=center| 1242 || align=center| 1676 || align=center| 2107 || align=center| 2690 || align=center| 3163 |- | colspan=7 align=center| <small>Starting in 1962: Population without duplicates</small> |} ==Places of interest== * The church of St. Marguerite, dating from the nineteenth century. * A sixteenth-century stone cross in the cemetery. ==People== * It is the burial place of [[Jacques Anquetil]] (1934–1987) a [[road racing cyclist]]. ==See also== *[[Communes of the Seine-Maritime department]] *[[Seine-Maritime]] *[[Normandy]] ==References== *[http://www.insee.fr/en/home/home_page.asp INSEE] {{Reflist}} ==External links== *[http://www.mairie-quincampoix.fr/ Official website of Quincampoix] {{Fr}} *[http://www.quid.fr/communes.html?mode=detail&id=16705&req=Quincampoix Quincampoix on the Quid website] {{Fr}} {{Seine-Maritime communes}} [[Category:Communes of Seine-Maritime]] {{Rouen-geo-stub}}
